name: Get Some Foogin Sleep
description:
You're just trying to get a good night's sleep, but these dang ol' clouds keep, well, clouding.. your mind.
Pop them bad boys, and watch out for colorful intrusions!

Distractions are so hard to ignore, but once you get deeper into that deep flow state,
you'll unlock the moves of the prime primate (that's me btw, just, you know, yeah).

The deeper you go into sleep, the higher your score will rise. REM, of course, provides you with the greatest score multiplier.
The longer you remain in that deep REM sleep, the more you'll have made of those 9 hours.

Can you beat 40,000 points? Leave a comment, or shoot me a screenshot either here or on Twitter!

This was a submission for the Ludum Dare 48 game jam! The theme was Deeper and Deeper.
I really needed some good sleep lately, so this was the idea that came to mind.
Needless to say, working on this game did not help with that, hehe
